articles.content: Amid notices being sent to start-ups, the Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) has stepped in to direct its officers to not carry out scrutiny of angel tax provisions for start-ups recognised by the … [+4179 chars]

articles.author: Shailaja Mohapatra
articles.title: No price hikes for paints industry in FY23-24, reduced rebates will protect margins - Moneycontrol
articles.description: JSW Paints clocked more than Rs 1,500 crore in revenues in FY22-23. Currently, the decorative paints segment comprises 55 percent of its revenues, and industrial paints comprise 45 percent
articles.content: Despite crude prices trending upwards of $90 per barrel, paint majors are not looking at price hikes this financial year. The industry had hiked rates by 20-25 percent in FY21-22, and prices have bee… [+3417 chars]
